text with # char

text more text

text
next line text

**bold**

__bold__

**bold****bold**

__bold____bold__

**normal*

__normal_

*normal**

_normal__

text **bold** text

text __bold__ text

(**bold**)

(__bold__)

*italic*

_italic_

*italic**italic*

_italic__italic_

*normal

_normal

normal*

normal_

text *italic* text

text _italic_ text

(*italic*)

(_italic_)
